entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010tb_header = input_table_1%%00010tb_val = input_table_2%%00010%%00010tb = {'POLLUTANT':[], 'UNIT':[], 'VALUE':[]}%%00010%%00010#prazdna struktura%%00010for i in range(1, tb_val.shape[0]):%%00010%%00009for col in tb_val.columns:%%00010%%00009%%00009#vyselektovat hlavni sloupce%%00010%%00009%%00009if tb_val[col][0] is None or tb_val[col][0]=='NaN':%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009tb[tb_header[col][0]]=[]%%00010#print(tb)%%00010#plnit%%00010for i in range(1, tb_val.shape[0]):%%00010%%00009for col in tb_val.columns:%%00010%%00009%%00009if tb_header[col][0] not in tb:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009tb['POLLUTANT'].append(tb_header[col][0])%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009tb['UNIT'].append(tb_val[col][0])%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009tb['VALUE'].append(tb_val[col][i])%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009for sloup in tb:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009if sloup not in ['POLLUTANT','UNIT','VALUE']:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009#nazev col dle hodnoty v tb_header, napr GNFR%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009cl = [cl for cl, v in tb_header.items() if v[0]==sloup]%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009tb[sloup].append(tb_val[cl[0]][i])%%00010%%00010output_table=pd.DataFrame(tb)%%00010%%00009%%00009
